quote: I think you still love me, but we can’t escape the fact that I’m not enough for you. I knew this was going to happen. So I’m not blaming you for falling in love with another woman. I’m not angry, either. I should be, but I’m not. I just feel pain. A lot of pain. I thought I could imagine how much this would hurt, but I was wrong.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I don't hold back because that's how you hurt yourself.
author: Chester Bennington

quote: What a waste of time, the thought crossed my mind but I never missed a beat.
author: The Bravery

quote: Well Jesus Christ, I'm not afraid to die. I'm a little bit scared of what comes after. Do I get the gold chariot? Do I float through the ceiling? Or do I fall apart because my bright is too slight to hold back all my dark?
author: Brand New
